summary: This file defines a set of utility functions and classes for point cloud processing, including operations for indexing points, calculating distances, constructing graphs based on fixed radii, and extracting relative position features. It also provides custom neural network layers such as BiConv2d, BiLinear, BiLinearLSR, and BinaryQuantize for specialized convolutional and bilinear transformations, as well as binary quantization.
business_intent: The code aims to facilitate the development of point cloud neural networks by offering reusable components for common geometric operations and custom layers, enabling efficient processing and analysis of 3D point cloud data in deep learning models.
